package.name: ur3_description
package.description: URDF description for Universal UR3 robot with a robotiq gripper. The model for the UR3 robot (without gripper) was taken from: https://github.com/ros-industrial/universal_robot.git inspired also on http://osrobotics.org/osr/ implementation of denso robot with robotiq gripper.
package.author: Cristian C Beltran-Hernandez
